message: Hi Sir, I am implementing TCP/IP protocol using LabVIEW. At this point everything works fine except for TCP half open connection issue. I don't have access to server side so server must detect the dropped connection from running LabVIEW VI but it can't using TCP read function. Is there any way to solve this issue from LabVIEW application level? or to be specific is there any way to solve the half open connection issue using LabVIEW? if not what external function/software I need to use so that LabVIEW TCP read function can detect error 66 (dropped connection error) and go back to TCP listen & wait for new connection to be established.
